newnews.news_title: An update for Garry's Mod is coming out!
newnews.news_description: On June 24, at the usual time of 4pm GMT, an update will be released that will be optional for server owners. The update will include a pre-release branch, that is, the next version of Garry's Mod, which contains all the changes in the next updates to the game.

newmodules.moduledescription: The code system, is well suited for Roleplay and for those servers who want to plunge into role-playing progress.
Discord Logs will facilitate the work of the server Administration. Help better monitor and record the violations of the server, through Discord.
A simple scoreboard for your server.
A LFS Travel System is designed to move between locations on the map. It is well suited for RolePlay wagering.
This is a simple inventory with a simple interface that is under development, and it is not a fact that there will be no errors. Suitable for DarkRP mode.
